name: Zip Top Pouch - rust multi
description:
One of a kind zip top pouch made in patchwork fabrics from around the world. 

Made in New York City.

This style is 7" in height, 9" in width, and 1/2" in depth.

name: zip Top Pouch - blue multi
description:
One of a kind zip top pouch made in patchwork fabrics from around the world. 

Made in New York City.

This style is 7" in height, 9" in width, and 1/2" in depth.

name: Zip Top Pouch - grey multi
description:
One of a kind zip top pouch made in patchwork fabrics from around the world. 

Made in New York City.

This style is 7" in height, 9" in width, and 1/2" in depth.

name: Delores Duffel - pastel multi
description:
The Delores Duffel Bag in a soft and subtle pastel color combo makes a classic and feminine statement as medium size cross-body bag. This style has a removable and adjustable navy leather shoulder strap, zip-top closure, interior zip pocket and is fully lined in cotton twill. The raffia striped textile and leather are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

The dimensions of this style are 9" in height, 9.5" in width and 4" in depth. Innovative two-tone handle drop is 4"

name: LMC Clutch - burgundy/blush
description:
The LMC clutch features the THOMAS IV signature cut-out flap in a half moon shape. The front of this envelope clutch is made in burgundy washed calf leather with a blush matte leather flap while the back is in army green washed calf leather. This style is fully lined in cotton twill with an interior zip pocket. Wristlet drop is 7". All leathers are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

 The dimensions of this style are 17.5" in height, 15" in width and .5" in depth.

name: Nicky Bucket - burgundy
description:
The Nicky Bucket Bag in burgundy stone washed canvas is the perfect size carryall. With both front and back magnetic-closure outside pockets, there is plenty of room for storage. This handbag also has a removable and adjustable contrast navy leather shoulder strap, washed calf leather base in burgundy, zip-top closure, interior zip pocket and cellphone pocket and is fully lined in cotton twill.  Innovative two-tone handle has a drop of 4". The burgundy canvas and leather are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

The dimensions of this style are 10" in height, 12" in width and 9" in depth.

name: Delores Duffel - black/natural
description:
The Delores Duffel Bag in graphic and versatile black and natural color combo makes a great statement as medium size cross-body bag. This style has a removable and adjustable black leather shoulder strap, zip-top closure, interior zip pocket and is fully lined in cotton twill. The raffia striped textile and leather are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

The dimensions of this style are 9" in height, 9.5" in width and 4" in depth. Innovative two-tone handle drop is 4"

name: LMC Clutch - painterly black
description:
The LMC clutch features the THOMAS IV signature cut-out flap in a half moon shape. The front of this envelope clutch is made in painterly black leather while the back is in matte black leather. This style is fully lined in cotton twill with an interior zip pocket. All leathers are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

Also available in dusty rose/burgundy.

The dimensions of this style are 17.5" in height, 15" in width and .5" in depth. Wristlet drop is 7"

name: Nicky Bucket - army green
description:
The Nicky Bucket Bag in army green stone washed canvas is the perfect size carryall. With both front and back magnetic-closure outside pockets, there is plenty of room for storage. This handbag also has a removable and adjustable black leather shoulder strap, washed calf leather base in army green, zip-top closure, interior zip pocket and cellphone pocket and is fully lined in cotton twill. The army green canvas and leather are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

The dimensions of this style are 10" in height, 12" in width and 9" in depth. Innovative two-tone handle has a drop of 4".

name: TPC Clutch - burgundy/blush
description: The TPC clutch features the THOMAS IV signature cut-out flap in a traditional envelope shape. The front of this envelope clutch is made in burgundy washed calf leather while the back is made in blush matte leather. This style is fully lined in cotton twill with an interior patch pocket. The dimensions of this style are 9" in height, 12" in width and 1" in depth. Wristlet drop is 7". All leathers are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

name: TPC Clutch - army/black
description: The TPC clutch features the THOMAS IV signature cut-out flap in a traditional envelope shape. The front of this envelope clutch is made in army green washed calf leather while the back is made in black matte leather. This style is fully lined in cotton twill with an interior patch pocket. The dimensions of this style are 9" in height, 12" in width and 1" in depth. Wristlet drop is 7". All leathers are from Italy and the bag itself is made in NYC.

name: Marilynn Duffle - camel/graphic
description:
This small and casual duffle bag is made in graphic, textured black and beige jacquard mixed with camel cow hide. Carried by its handles or worn cross-body, this style looks great with any relaxed outfit. Top zipper closure, long adjustable shoulder strap. Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket.  Italian leather. French textile. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 7" in height, 10" in width and 4.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 4".

name: Nathaniel Tote - yellow stripe/camel
description:
Big enough to fit your laptop and your iPad, this relaxed tote features two fixed handles in two-tone leather and a removable strap long enough to be worn cross-body and adjustable enough to be worn as a shoulder strap. Made in camel cow hide combined with graphic, yellow and natural woven canvas. Top zipper closure, fully lined. Interior zipper pocket as well as cellphone pocket. Italian leather and textile. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 13" in height, 14" in width and 4" in depth. Adjustable shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 9".

name: Wagner Wallet - chartreuse, camel, aubergine
description:
The perfect, simple, unlined wallet. Great for carrying cash, credit cards and business cards. Matte black metal snap closure. Neon orange detail stitching on your choice of camel, chartreuse or aubergine cow hide. Italian leather. Made in New York City.

This style is 3" in height, 4.5" in width and 1" in depth.

name: Vinnie Bucket - camel/graphic
description:
This zip-top bucket bag features an innovative frame top flap closure revealing the the graphic jacquard fabric that lies beneath. Silver zipper closure in addition to magnetic top flap closure. Rich cow hide in camel combined with black and beige geo woven fabric makes this style versatile. Deep back pocket in leather with magnetic snap closure. Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket and cellphone pocket. Fixed top handle as well as long adjustable and removable shoulder strap allows the option to wear this style as a shoulder bag or a cross-body bag. Italian leather and French textile. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 10.5" in height, 9.5" width and 9.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 4.5"

name: Nathaniel Tote - kelly green stripe/brown
description:
Big enough to fit your laptop and your iPad, this relaxed tote features two fixed handles in two-tone leather and a removable strap long enough to be worn cross-body and adjustable enough to be worn as a shoulder strap.  Made in high sheen brown cow hide combined with graphic, kelly green and natural woven canvas. Top zipper closure, fully lined. Interior zipper pocket as well as cellphone pocket. Italian leather and textile. Made in New York City. 

The dimensions of this style are 13" in height, 14" in width and 4" in depth. Adjustable shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 9".

name: Margot Bag - black/multi
description:
This small to medium size bag features an innovative frame top flap closure revealing the vibrant printed fabric that lies beneath.  Silver zipper closure in addition to magnetic top flap closure. Rich cow hide in black is combined with kelly green stripe canvas and samurai printed burlap.  Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket. Fixed top handle as well as long adjustable and removable shoulder strap allows the option to wear this style as a shoulder bag or a cross-body bag. Italian leather and textiles. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 7" in height, 10" in width and 4.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 50". Top handle drop is 4".

name: Vinnie Bucket - black/multi
description:
This zip-top bucket bag features an innovative frame top flap closure revealing the the vibrant printed fabric that lies beneath.  Silver zipper closure in addition to magnetic top flap closure. Rich cow hide in black is combined with kelly green stripe canvas and samurai printed burlap. Deep back pocket in leather with magnetic snap closure.  Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket and cellphone pocket. Fixed top handle as well as long adjustable and removable shoulder strap allows the option to wear this style as a shoulder bag or a cross-body bag. Italian leather and textiles. Made in New York City. 

The dimensions of this style are 10.5" in height, 9.5" width and 9.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 4.5"

name: Margot Bag - brown zebra
description:
This small to medium size bag features an innovative frame top flap closure revealing the abstracted zebra printed fabric that lies beneath.  Silver zipper closure in addition to magnetic top flap closure. Rich cow hide in deep chocolate brown is combined with matching brown suede.  Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket. Fixed top handle as well as long adjustable and removable shoulder strap allows the option to wear this style as a shoulder bag or a cross-body bag. Italian leather and textiles. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 7" in height, 10" in width and 4.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 50". Top handle drop is 4".

name: Joanie Bucket - brown/black/zebra
description:
Joanie Bucket bag in shiny brown leather and rich brown suede with black leather base and shoulder strap. Featuring 4 patch pockets with magnetic closures around the outside in 100% cotton abstract zebra-printed fabric. Leather drawstring top closure and adjustable shoulder strap. Interior zipper pocket as well as cellphone pocket. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 13" in height, 9.5" in width and 9.5" in depth.

name: Marilynn Duffle - brown/camel green stripe
description:
This small and casual duffle bag is made in a graphic mix chocolate brown leather with a subtle sheen, matching brown suede, camel cow hide and kelly green stripe canvas. Carried by its handles or worn cross-body, this style looks great with any relaxed outfit. Top zipper closure, long adjustable shoulder strap. Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket.  Italian leather and textile. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 7" in height, 10" in width and 4.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 4".

name: Marilynn Duffle - camel/pastel pink/yllw stripe
description:

Carried by its handles or worn cross-body, this style looks great with any relaxed outfit. Top zipper closure, long adjustable shoulder strap. Fully lined. Interior zipper pocket. Italian leather and textile. Made in New York City.

The dimensions of this style are 7" in height, 10" in width and 4.5" in depth. Shoulder strap length extends to 46". Handle drop is 4".

name: Canvas Tote in honor of our blog: www.phuckfashion.com
description: The perfect over-sized carry-all to tote around your groceries, dry-cleaning or schoolbooks while making a true fashion statement. This cotton canvas tote is 15" in height, 20" in width and 5" in depth. Screen printed in Philadelphia by Print Liberation.
